name: 2 BLOCKS
description:
A casual game I made for a game jam. Couldn't finish it in time though. However, liked the idea of the theme, and worked on the game for a few days. 

Theme was: "Keep it simple"

At the moment, the timer mode works. The rounds mode will be up in a few days. That will include AI enemies as well. Hope you guys will enjoy the game. The project is actively under development.
